name: Yu-Rulings
description:
- Great app for Rulings

- A ruling is a official statement for cards which clarifies the interactions between cards and card effects.

- With Yu-Rulings you can quickly see the official rulings on the local archive or online if you have an Internet connection.

- The latter option allows you to have access to the latest rulings information.

- For each card there is also a chance to update the local archive with the online rulings if they have changed.

- Option to add new cards to the local archive.

- The search function allows you to find the card by typing the name in part.

.
